@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“sertan8, post:4, topic:541296”][quote author=lare69 link=topic=660169.msg4414668#msg4414668 date=1395283544]
oh the wonders of packet validation
[/quote]

what do you guys mean by that?[/quote]Check incoming packets to make sure they are real.
ie if a player is trying to drop an item they don’t have.

item.title: Cheat Engine Trade Dupe Fix
item.dc:creator: @JoeBenton2014 JoeBenton2014
item.description:
@JoeBenton2014 wrote:

[b]I put this here because people never seem to use the snippet section.

[b]Nvm about that ^ John moved it to here

Anyways here is how to fix the trade dupe with cheat engine.

[b]Cheat Engine Trade Dupe Fix:

In TradeAndDuel find:

if (!c.inTrade || !c.canOffer) {
				declineTrade();
				return false;
			}

[b]Under that place:

if(!c.getItems().playerHasItem(itemID, amount))
		return false;

[b]Then find:

if(i == itemID || itemID >= 6864 && itemID <= 6882) { c.sendMessage("You can't stake this item."); return false;

[b]Under that place:

if(!c.getItems().playerHasItem(itemID, amount))
		return false;

[b]Then goto BankX2 and find:

case 3322:

[b]Under that place:

if(!c.getItems().playerHasItem(c.xRemoveId, amount))
		return;

[b]Then find:

case 3415:

[b]Under that place:

	if(!c.getItems().playerHasItem(c.xRemoveId, amount))
		return;

[b]Then find:

case 6669:

[b]Under that place:

if(!c.getItems().playerHasItem(c.xRemoveId, amount))
		return;

[b]Thanks for looking

Read full topic
